title: FC Kuban-Holding Pavlovskaya
text:
FC Kuban-Holding Pavlovskaya () is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team based in <a href="Pavlovskaya%2C%20Krasnodar%20Krai">Pavlovskaya, Krasnodar Krai</a>. It was founded in 2015 and played on the amateur level. For 2020–21 season, it received the license for the third-tier <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a>.
Current squad.
As of 23 December 2021, according to the <a href="https%3A//www.pfl-russia.com/teams/10033/season-2021-2022/">FNL 2 website</a>.
